publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1737 Shona Robison: Rector of Dundee University—That the Parliament congratulates comedian Fred McAulay on being elected as the Rector of Dundee University and wishes him every success in pursuing the interests and promoting the welfare of the students of the university.
S1M-1737 Rector of Dundee University (lodged on 9 March 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1737 Rector of Dundee University (lodged on 9 March 2001) Colin Campbell*, Ms Sandra White*, Ben Wallace*

S1M-1737 Shona Robison: Rector of Dundee University—That the Parliament congratulates comedian Fred McAulay on being elected as the Rector of Dundee University and wishes him every success in pursuing the interests and promoting the welfare of the students of the university. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fiona McLeod, Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Ben Wallace
S1M-1737 Rector of Dundee University (lodged on 9 March 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Kay Ullrich*
S1M-1737 Rector of Dundee University (lodged on 9 March 2001) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1737 Rector of Dundee University (lodged on 9 March 2001) Nick Johnston*

S1M-1737 Shona Robison: Rector of Dundee University—That the Parliament congratulates comedian Fred McAulay on being elected as the Rector of Dundee University and wishes him every success in pursuing the interests and promoting the welfare of the students of the university. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fiona McLeod, Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Ben Wallace, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Kay Ullrich, Andrew Wilson, Nick Johnston
S1M-1737 Rector of Dundee University (lodged on 9 March 2001) Richard Lochhead*

S1M-1737 Shona Robison: Rector of Dundee University—That the Parliament congratulates comedian Fred McAulay on being elected as the Rector of Dundee University and wishes him every success in pursuing the interests and promoting the welfare of the students of the university. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fiona McLeod, Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Ben Wallace, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Kay Ullrich, Andrew Wilson, Nick Johnston, Richard Lochhead
S1M-1737 Rector of Dundee University (lodged on 9 March 2001) Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-1737 Shona Robison: Rector of Dundee University—That the Parliament congratulates comedian Fred McAulay on being elected as the Rector of Dundee University and wishes him every success in pursuing the interests and promoting the welfare of the students of the university. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fiona McLeod, Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Ben Wallace, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Kay Ullrich, Andrew Wilson, Nick Johnston, Richard Lochhead, Mr Brian Monteith
S1M-1737 Rector of Dundee University (lodged on 9 March 2001) Robin Harper*

S1M-1737 Shona Robison: Rector of Dundee University—That the Parliament congratulates comedian Fred McAulay on being elected as the Rector of Dundee University and wishes him every success in pursuing the interests and promoting the welfare of the students of the university.
